full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 367 Filed 10/22/21 Page 16 of 35 Juror ID: Summarize what you know or have heard about this case, Ghislaine Maxwell or Jeffrey Epstein: Please respond to the following based upon anything you have read, seen or heard and discussed with family, friends, colleagues and co-workers, have you formed any impression or opinion about this case? If Yes please state your impressions or opinions: Have you personally formed an opinion about Ms. Maxwell's guilt or innocence as a result of anything you have heard, read or seen? Yes No If Yes, please state summarize your opinion: Have you discussed this case with family, friends, colleagues, or co-workers? No Yes If Yes, summarized what was discussed: Have you verbally stated or posted your opinion on social media about Ms. Maxwell or Mr. Epstein? No Yes If Yes, when and where did you state, or post your opinion? Before today had you read, seen, or heard anything about criminal charges brought against Ms. Maxwell? No Yes If Yes, please state what you remember hearing, and how or from whom you may have heard (e.g., a friend, the newspaper, a web site): -16- DOJ-OGR-00005338

text_blocks.content: Juror ID: Summarize what you know or have heard about this case, Ghislaine Maxwell or Jeffrey Epstein:

Please respond to the following based upon anything you have read, seen or heard and discussed with family, friends, colleagues and co-workers, have you formed any impression or opinion about this case?
If Yes please state your impressions or opinions:
Have you personally formed an opinion about Ms. Maxwell's guilt or innocence as a result of anything you have heard, read or seen?
If Yes, please state summarize your opinion:
Have you discussed this case with family, friends, colleagues, or co-workers?
If Yes, summarized what was discussed:
Have you verbally stated or posted your opinion on social media about Ms. Maxwell or Mr. Epstein?
If Yes, when and where did you state, or post your opinion?
Before today had you read, seen, or heard anything about criminal charges brought against Ms. Maxwell?
If Yes, please state what you remember hearing, and how or from whom you may have heard (e.g., a friend, the newspaper, a web site):

additional_notes: The document appears to be a juror questionnaire in a court case involving Ghislaine Maxwell. The questionnaire asks various questions about the juror's knowledge and opinions about the case, Ghislaine Maxwell, and Jeffrey Epstein. The document is page 16 of 35 and has a document number of 367. There are no visible handwritten notes or stamps on the document.
